text: Kielbasa ( or ; from Polish ) is any type of meat sausage from Poland, and a staple of Polish cuisine. In American English the word typically refers to a coarse, U-shaped smoked sausage of any kind of meat, which closely resembles the Wiejska sausage (typically pork only) in British English. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Polish Kielbasa (Polish Sausage) * Czech klob√°sy recipe (In Czech) Category:Sausage Category:Polish food
title: Kielbasa
